string.name: signup_link
string.a: Don\'t have an account? Sign up here.

resources.string: You must enable device administratoion for certain features of Monitordroid to function.
Device is already registered on the server.
From GCM: server deleted %1$d pending messages!
Trying (attempt %1$d/%2$d) to register device on server.
From web server: successfully added new device with name
From web server: Failed to add new device with name
Please make sure you have created an account and typed its name correctly into the \"Account Email\" field on the previous screen. Press back to try again.
Could not register device on server after %1$d attempts. Please ensure the device\'s date and time are set accurately.
Could not unregister device on Monitordroid Server (%1$s).
